author: Dan Avis
comment: Simple idea, well executed, and really useful. Wish this had been about when I was a kid!

author: Adam O'Connor
comment: Love it! Simple design and you can set your own tap tempo. Brilliant!

author: Eric Swanson
comment: Same issue as Brian, but with Samsung Gear Live watch. Restarted, reinstalled, resynced, reset and never shows on the watch.

author: David Kingston
comment: Would not connect to watch or show up anywhere. I tried fixing it but there is no way to connect it to the watch.

author: PhatDeth oNeKOG
comment: Will not install on to watch

author: T C
comment: Even after a factory reset, this product says it installs and is shown installed on my LG G3 running Marshmallow, but it never shows up on my watch - Moto360 gen 2. All other Android Ware apps I install work fine. Oh well, time to find another metronome for my watch. The author helped for awhile but now won't help further. Uninstalled.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: We are terribly sorry that we couldn't help you

title: Will no longer install

author: Bas van Langevelde
comment: My Asus Zenwatch 2 has a working speaker, I would it be possible to add an option to also make sound? I practice a lot with other people and turning the sound on to let them hear the tempo would be great!

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: Hi. Thank you for your review and your idea, but we think making sound from watch isn't a good idea. We don't mean that your idea is bad -- but you can make much bigger sound with your smartphone than watch!

title: Great app but I do have a request

author: Stephen Kendall
comment: It's really great to see how responsive the developer is to user feedback, specifically relative to the addition of tap to get tempo functionality. However, there are a few problems with it. First, the haptic feedback is late enough that it's rather disorienting, at least on my Moto 360 (1st gen). I would personally prefer no feedback at all. And second, the button that you tap to set the tempo moves after you initially tap it. I think it would be better for it to stay in the same place.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: Hi. Thank you for your idea and it'll applied in next update. Again thank you!

title: Ever-improving, needs a few tweaks to make it great

author: Joey Izzo
comment: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's simple and effective. Maybe it's the limitations of my G Watch but I would like intensity control for the vibrations. Different time signatures would be nice too.. (This had nothing to do with the app itself but the app icon almost made it too easy to skip by in the search results, the 1/4 dots looks like a low app rating. I had to take a second look to see that this was indeed what I was looking for)
title: Exactly what I was looking for

comment: And I'd give it 5 stars if you could change time signatures. It would be even better if you could add different accent beats too! I've noticed that the developer seems very interested in bringing requested features to the app so I hope they'll consider my requests.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: Hi. Thank you for your idea, and you're idea will be accepted in the next version! Please wait for the next update.

title: I like the idea of this app...

author: Frank
comment: I also use this app for CPR and had one issue with the app. Dev came back and fixed in <24hr! 5 star service!

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: We're very happy that you liked the update. Hope you save as much as lives with our application :)

title: Simple and works perfect!

author: Tyler F
comment: Great app, has everything I want except for a button to tap out the tempo manually, which is very useful for drummers.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: Hi. Sorry, we're late and be happy! We've just pushed an update which includes "Tap Tempo" feature! Please update dMetronome to 15.11 version!

title: Could use tap tempo

author: Timothy Bates
comment: If your kids are learning music, pop this on your watch and let them try it! Very tactile and intuitive
title: Innovative and practical?

author: Mc-Shane Shinners
comment: Your watch just backed up ur phone
title: Wanka

author: Robert Dike
comment: I did a few practices with it and it's made a huge difference in my sound

author: Jesse Coletta
comment: Sabotage!

author: Zack Childers
comment: Excellent application, and very responsive developers.  The app is simple in nature, but does a good job with smart watches. Note* it's something best used when establishing a tempo, and prolonged vibrations may tire the wrist.  Good app, great developers.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: We're very happy that you liked the update :)

title: Excellent Developers and App

author: Tyson Kemp
comment: I like this for drumming, but why nothing above 8/8? Id like to see 9/8 10/8 11/8 12/8 ... At least.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: Hi Tyson. We just published 14.10.8 update which contains 9, 10, 11, 12 beats supporting. Please update dMetronome!

title: Drummer

author: mekayla snyder
comment: This app works AMAZING for cpr. I'm a firefighter/emt and unfortunately do cpr a lot. Timing can easily get screwed up under pressure. This app keeps a constant beat with the appropriate compressions per minute. Most of our department have apps on their phones for this but nobody really likes risking their phones to things like blood or heights. This is super convenient to be on a watch. A lot of us are switching to the smart watch world and this is a wonderful app for things we do. Thank you!

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: We hope you save as many as possible lives with our application. :)

title: CPR! LG g watch r

author: David Carli-Arnold
comment: This app is great! It does what it's supposed to (be a metronome) and it does it extremely well, I love that I don't have a loud noise going off every beat, but rather a gentle but very noticeable vibration on my wrist. The actual developers are great too! I left a review when I first downloaded this app with a couple features it still needed, and within 2 days I'd received a reply to my review and an update with all those features.  Then last night, right before going to sleep, I left a review with a huge bug, and by morning I had another reply and an update that fixed the bug. The developers really listen to, and care about our feedback!

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: Did you liked update? User's feedback is really important for us, and we always do our best to provide you a best applications. ;)

title: Amazing App, Amazing Developers!

author: Vani Monkeybear
comment: A must have for every smartwatch user musician!! Useful also for keeping time while exercising
title: Simple and prefect!

author: Joshua Garner
comment: Great update. Well done app and the developers are quick to fix issues in the app.

reply.author: Digutsoft
reply.content: We're very happy that you liked the update :)

title: Works flawlessly

author: Michael Jordan
comment: This is an excellent and well-implemented concept. Exactly what a Wear app should be. Thanks!
title: Well Made

author: V D
comment: Brilliant idea

author: Larry McIntyre
comment: Limited to 4/4 timing and needs intensity control s.
title: Limited Features
